title: When I go to Settings -> Google, "Chromebook" used to be there as an option, but now it's gone.
content: I'm writing to let you know that Better Together worked successfully with my Pixel 2 phone and my Pixelbook.  But...on my Pixel 2 running Android, when I go to Settings -> Google, "Chromebook" used to be there as an option, but now it's disappeared. Restarting my Pixel 2 didn't help. Please can you release a newer version of Google Play Services to bring back the "Chromebook" option found in Settings -> Google?
